titleStmt.title: Spirituall preseruatiues against the pestilence. Or Seuen lectures on the 91. Psalme First printed in Anno. 1593. And now reuised, corrected, and published, as generally for the instruction of ignorant people: so specially for the confirmation of the weake seruants of Iesus Christ; descibing the most diuine and most soueraigne preseruatiues against the pestilence. By H. Holland. Hereunto is added a sweete prayer of M. R. Greenhams, neuer before published.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Henry, 1555 or 6-1603.
Greenham, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Iohn Browne and Roger Iackson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
